Q

queryAnnouncementSystem(String) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
save result to announcementsystems' list
queryBuildings(String) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
save building to buildings' list
QueryDrawGeoEngine - Class in main
 
QueryDrawGeoEngine(DrawToGraphEngine) - Constructor for class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
 
queryEmergency(Point) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
first, find nearest announce system of queryPointCenter then for each student within the announce system assign him the second nearest system (simulate the covering system is broken)
queryNearestAnnounce(Point) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
query for the nearest AnnounceSystem from the point clicked
queryPoint(Map<String, Boolean>, Point, int) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
perform query Point method query within circle with center(queryPointCenter), radius(queryPointRadius) for student, building or announce system, mark them green on image.
queryRange(Map<String, Boolean>, ArrayList<Point>) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
sequence of left click for range (end with right click) to perform query this function will query for all active features(student, announc system, buildings) within the range specified by points array
queryStudents(String) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
save students from query to students(list)
querySurroundAnnounce(Point) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
query all students within range of the announce system
queryWhole(Map<String, Boolean>) - Method in class main.QueryDrawGeoEngine
perform queryWhole method display all student, announceSystem or buildings on image
